OpenCms Command Line Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2015-02-15  | Version: 1.1-SNAPSHOT
OpenCms Command Line Maven Plugin
Parent Project
  • KamomileWare Maven Plugins Parent
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

opencms-cli:redeploy

Full name:

com.kamomileware.maven.plugin.opencms:opencms-cli-maven-plugin:1.1-SNAPSHOT:redeploy

Description:

Goal which copies the module file to the OpenCms application configured in the project and then installs it. The module file is copied to ${opencms.home}/WEB-INF/packages/modules directory. The installation is done via generated script by CmsShell.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
appServerBaseDir File - Base dir for servlet container installation (tomcat). Defaults to ${catalina.base}".
Default value is: ${catalina.base}.
User property is: catalina.base.
moduleFile File - Location of the module file to install. Defaults to target/<artifactId>-<version>.zip.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}.zip.
User property is: module.file.
openCmsBaseDir String - Base dir for OpenCms installation. Defaults to ${catalina.home}/webapps/ROOT".
Default value is: ${catalina.home}/webapps/ROOT.
User property is: opencms.home.
workDirectory File - Directory to copy conversed to native resources into if needed
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/module/work.
User property is: work.directory.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
moduleName String - (no description)
User property is: manifest.module.name.
openCmsServerAuthId String - Id credentials in settings
User property is: opencms.server.id.
openCmsServetMapping String - Mapping for the OpenCms dispatcher servlet. Defaults to "/*".
User property is: opencms.servlet.mapping.
openCmsUserName String - User that installs the module on the OpenCms instance.
User property is: opencms.user.name.
openCmsUserPass String - Credentials for the OpenCms user.
User property is: opencms.user.pass.
openCmsWebappName String - Name of the webapp aplication name for OpenCms.
User property is: opencms.webapp.name.

Parameter Details

appServerBaseDir:

Base dir for servlet container installation (tomcat). Defaults to ${catalina.base}".
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: catalina.base
  • Default: ${catalina.base}

moduleFile:

Location of the module file to install. Defaults to target/<artifactId>-<version>.zip.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: module.file
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}.zip

moduleName:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: manifest.module.name

openCmsBaseDir:

Base dir for OpenCms installation. Defaults to ${catalina.home}/webapps/ROOT".
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: opencms.home
  • Default: ${catalina.home}/webapps/ROOT

openCmsServerAuthId:

Id credentials in settings
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: opencms.server.id

openCmsServetMapping:

Mapping for the OpenCms dispatcher servlet. Defaults to "/*".
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: opencms.servlet.mapping

openCmsUserName:

User that installs the module on the OpenCms instance.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: opencms.user.name

openCmsUserPass:

Credentials for the OpenCms user.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: opencms.user.pass

openCmsWebappName:

Name of the webapp aplication name for OpenCms.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: opencms.webapp.name

workDirectory:

Directory to copy conversed to native resources into if needed
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: work.directory
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/module/work
